actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for a presentation of "America, O America, The Beautiful" to a joint meeting of the Congress.

summary.text: Directs the Speaker of the House and the President of the Senate to make the arrangements necessary to provide for the presentation of "America, O America the Beautiful", by Chaplain Robert E. Wall, to a joint meeting of the House and Senate in celebration of the Bicentennial Year.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a presentation of "America, O America, The Beautiful" to a joint meeting of the Congress.
